nodes.speaker: INCEL
nodes.text: *doesn't stand up* You're 47 minutes late. I have a spreadsheet. Time is money, and statistically, women waste both.

nodes.speaker: INCEL
nodes.text: Classic DARVO. Deny, Attack, Reverse Victim and Offender. I learned about this from a 4-hour YouTube essay.

nodes.speaker: WAITER
nodes.text: Good evening, can I get you two start— oh. Is everything okay here?

nodes.speaker: INCEL
nodes.text: Accountability. Rare in a female. You're already in the top 12% of my matches. Don't let it go to your head.

nodes.speaker: INCEL
nodes.text: Interesting. Questioning objective reality. Did your last boyfriend—sorry, 'situationship'—teach you that? Let me guess: 6'2", finance bro, treated you like garbage?

nodes.speaker: INCEL
nodes.text: Society hurt me. The 80/20 rule hurt me. Women choosing the top 20% of men while guys like me—who actually READ—rot. But you wouldn't understand hypergamy.

nodes.speaker: INCEL
nodes.text: 'Female' is biologically accurate. 'Woman' is a social construct. I don't make the rules. Actually, I do make the rules, because I've done the research.

nodes.speaker: WAITER
nodes.text: Good evening. Can I start you off with drinks, or would you prefer to continue... whatever this is?

nodes.speaker: INCEL
nodes.text: So. I've developed an algorithm that predicts dating success based on canthal tilt, wrist circumference, and crypto portfolio. Want to see where you rank?

choices.label: Can we have a normal conversation?
I need to use the restroom.

nodes.speaker: INCEL
nodes.text: *opens laptop* See this column? 'Likelihood of responding.' You're highlighted yellow—'statistical anomaly.' Most women in your looksmatch range ghost me within 3 messages.

nodes.speaker: INCEL
nodes.text: 'Normal conversation.' You mean the bluepilled small talk that Chads use to manipulate women into situationships? Fine. What's your... favorite color, I guess.

nodes.speaker: PLAYER
nodes.text: You grab your coat and leave before the bread arrives. A new personal record.
nodes.endingText: You escaped in 47 seconds. He will make a podcast episode about this.

nodes.speaker: PLAYER
nodes.text: You climb out the bathroom window. The toilet seat was up. Of course it was.
nodes.endingText: The bathroom escape: older than feminism, twice as effective.

nodes.speaker: INCEL
nodes.text: *stops typing* Wait. You're... actually interested in my methodology? This is unprecedented. I need to add a new column. 'Intellectually curious females.' Population: 1.
nodes.endingText: You are now Exhibit A in his manifesto.

nodes.speaker: INCEL
nodes.text: UNHINGED? I have SOURCES. Peer-reviewed YouTube videos. You're just mad because the data doesn't lie and the data says you're a 6 who thinks she's an 8—
nodes.endingText: Security escorted him out. He live-tweeted the whole thing.

nodes.speaker: INCEL
nodes.text: Blue? *long pause* That's... my favorite too. It's the color of logic. And sadness. *clears throat* Do you want to split the tendies?
nodes.endingText: Against all odds, chicken tenders brought you together. Love is statistically improbable.

nodes.speaker: PLAYER
nodes.text: I appreciate you coming out, but I think we want different things. Good luck with your algorithm.
nodes.endingText: You left with dignity. He added you to the 'polite rejection' spreadsheet.
